Posts.EditableText:
Hi there.

Note that I'm still new to this website so I may not understand a lot of things.

But I've constantly been getting an error/glitch in which I can't make a game. Whether it's a game-book or a text adventure it always shows the same thing "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request"

Note that I'm also using the web version and not the downloadable version as I'm using a chrome book.

Thanks for any help!

(also yes I have checked https://. It's indeed https.)
Posts.HTML:
Hi there.

Note that I'm still new to this website so I may not understand a lot of things.

But I've constantly been getting an error/glitch in which I can't make a game. Whether it's a game-book or a text adventure it always shows the same thing "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request"

Note that I'm also using the web version and not the downloadable version as I'm using a chrome book.

Thanks for any help!

(also yes I have checked https://. It's indeed https.)
